title: Ledger Calculator
description: Ledger Calculator is a web application designed to assist users in managing their financial records and transactions. The application provides a user-friendly interface for inputting and categorizing expenses, income, and other financial data. Users can easily track their spending habits, generate reports, and visualize their financial health through charts and graphs. Ledger Calculator also includes features such as budget planning, expense forecasting, and integration with popular financial tools for seamless data import and export.
tech: Chart.js for data visualization and financial reporting
LocalStorage API for storing user data and financial records
File API for importing and exporting financial data in CSV format
